name: ImagineNation
description:
A two player student game set in a massive pillow fort.

Xbox360 controller and mouse/keyboard support (one player must have an xbox360 controller).

Explore a massive pillow fort world through the eyes of two kids.

The boogieman has filled the whole fort with darkness and taken over your toys! You must make your way through the fort and defeat the boogieman to light the fort once more.

Made by 12 students during the last three semesters of our game development course.
